TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ServiceDescriptionImporter extends System.Object

summary.span: 公开一种为 XML Web services 生成客户端代理类的方法。

span.span: Exposes a means of generating client proxy classes for XML Web services.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常由 Web 服务描述语言 (WSDL) 文件描述 XML Web 服务的接口。The interface to an XML Web service is typically described by a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) file. 例如，若要获取使用 ASP.NET Web 服务的 WSDL 说明公开在`http://localhost/service.asmx`，只需导航到`http://localhost/service.asmx?WSDL`。For example, to obtain a WSDL description of a Web service using ASP.NET exposed at `http://localhost/service.asmx`, simply navigate to `http://localhost/service.asmx?WSDL`. 类允许您轻松地导入到 WSDL 说明中包含的信息对象。The class allows you to easily import the information contained in a WSDL description into a object. 通过调整的值参数，你可以指示实例或者若要生成的客户端代理类，它以透明方式调用它来提供 Web 服务的功能，或生成一个抽象类无需执行它封装 Web 服务的功能。By adjusting the value of the parameter, you can instruct a instance either to generate a client proxy class that provides the functionality of the Web service by transparently calling it or to generate an abstract class that encapsulates the functionality of the Web service without implementing it. 在随后出现的代码对象可以然后直接调用或在你选择的语言中导出。The code in the resulting object can then either be called directly or exported in the language of your choice. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用类生成的 WSDL 文件调用 XML Web 服务所述的代理客户端代码。The following example illustrates the use of the class to generate proxy client code that calls an XML Web service described by a WSDL file. [!code-cpp[WebServices_Description_Importer#0](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebServices_Description_Importer/CPP/import.cpp#0)] [!code-csharp[WebServices_Description_Importer#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebServices_Description_Importer/CS/import.cs#0)]

MemberSignature.Value: public void AddServiceDescription (System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription serviceDescription, string appSettingUrlKey, string appSettingBaseUrl);

.method public hidebysig instance void AddServiceDescription(class System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription serviceDescription, string appSettingUrlKey, string appSettingBaseUrl) cil managed
public: void AddServiceDescription(System::Web::Services::Description::ServiceDescription ^ serviceDescription, System::String ^ appSettingUrlKey, System::String ^ appSettingBaseUrl);

param.name: serviceDescription
param.span: 要添加到集合的 实例。

span.span: The instance to add to the collection

param.name: appSettingUrlKey
param.span: 设置代理类的 属性的初始值，代理类可通过由 serviceDescription 参数表示的实例生成。

span.span: Sets the initial value of the property of the proxy class to be generated from the instance represented by the serviceDescription parameter.

param.span: 指定它应该从 web.config 文件的 节生成。

span.span: Specifies that it should be generated from the web.config file's section.

param.name: appSettingBaseUrl
param.span: 设置代理类的 属性的初始值，代理类可通过由 serviceDescription 参数表示的实例生成。

span.span: Sets the initial value of the property of the proxy class to be generated from the instance represented by the serviceDescription parameter.

param.span: 指定它应该通过该参数的值和由 WSDL 文档中的 特性指定的 URL 的组合来构造。

span.span: Specifies that it should be constructed from a combination of the value of this parameter and the URL specified by the attribute in the WSDL document.

summary.span: 将指定的 添加到要导入的 值的集合中。

span.span: Adds the specified to the collection of values to be imported.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法将添加到将导入的集合的实例调用方法。Use this method to add instances to the collection that is to be imported when the method is called. 这两个字符串参数，`appSettingUrlKey`和`appSettingBaseUrl`，指定如何构造`Url`属性的 XML Web 服务代理。 要从导入生成值。The two string parameters, `appSettingUrlKey` and `appSettingBaseUrl`, specify how to construct the `Url` property of the XML Web service proxy that is to be generated from the imported value. `appSettingUrlKey`参数指定`Url`属性应读取 web.config 文件``节中的，使用参数值作为配置项。The `appSettingUrlKey` parameter specifies that the `Url` property should be read out of the web.config file's `` section by using the parameter value as the configuration key. 如果`appSettingUrlKey`参数是`null`或空字符串，则初始值由`location`Web 服务描述语言 (WSDL) 文档中的属性。If the `appSettingUrlKey` parameter is `null` or an empty string, the initial value is determined by the `location` attribute in the Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document. 如果值是`Server`，如果你尝试设置的值，将引发错误`appSettingUrlKey`参数。If the value of is `Server`, an error is raised if you attempt to set the value of the `appSettingUrlKey` parameter. `appSettingBaseUrl`参数指定的初始值`Url`属性应从此参数值和指定的 URL 的组合构造`location`的 WSDL 文档中的属性。The `appSettingBaseUrl` parameter specifies that the initial value for the `Url` property should be constructed from a combination of this parameter value and the URL specified by the `location` attribute in the WSDL document. `appSettingUrlKey`还必须指定参数。The `appSettingUrlKey` parameter must also be specified. `Url`属性构造通过组合的相对 URL (从构造`appSettingBaseUrl`参数和 WSDL 指定 URL) 替换为从 web.config 文件中加载的 URL。The `Url` property is constructed by combining a relative URL (constructed from the `appSettingBaseUrl` parameter and the WSDL-specified URL) with the URL loaded from the web.config file. 如果此参数为`null`或空字符串，该 URL 构造完全从 web.config 文件中的值。If this parameter is `null` or an empty string, the URL is constructed entirely from the value in the web.config file. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用方法时使用类。The following example illustrates the use of the method when using the class. [!code-cpp[WebServices_Description_Importer#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebServices_Description_Importer/CPP/import.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[WebServices_Description_Importer#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebServices_Description_Importer/CS/import.cs#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Xml::Serialization::CodeGenerationOptions CodeGenerationOptions { System::Xml::Serialization::CodeGenerationOptions get(); void set(System::Xml::Serialization::CodeGenerationOptions value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置用于代码生成的各种选项。

span.span: Gets or sets various options for code generation.

value.span: 枚举的成员或成员组合。

span.span: A member or combination of members of the enumeration.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性允许你指定各种选项时使用调用方法来生成代码。The property allows you to specify various options used when the method is called to generate code. 例如，可以指定是否为值类型生成的 WSDL 中所述的简单类型或命名空间类型，并且它们将生成为属性或字段。For example, you can specify whether simple types described in the WSDL are generated as value types or namespace types, and whether they are generated as properties or fields. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性。The following example illustrates the use of the property. [!code-cpp[WebServices_Description_Importer#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebServices_Description_Importer/CPP/import.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[WebServices_Description_Importer#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebServices_Description_Importer/CS/import.cs#4)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::CodeDom::Compiler::CodeDomProvider ^ CodeGenerator { System::CodeDom::Compiler::CodeDomProvider ^ get(); void set(System::CodeDom::Compiler::CodeDomProvider ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置服务说明导入程序使用的代码生成器。

span.span: Gets or sets the code generator used by the service description importer.

value.span: 服务说明导入程序用来生成代理代码的 接口。

span.span: The interface used by the service description importer to generate proxy code.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Collections.Specialized.StringCollection GenerateWebReferences (System.Web.Services.Description.WebReferenceCollection webReferences, System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider codeProvider, System.CodeDom.CodeCompileUnit codeCompileUnit, System.Web.Services.Description.WebReferenceOptions options);

.method public static hidebysig class System.Collections.Specialized.StringCollection GenerateWebReferences(class System.Web.Services.Description.WebReferenceCollection webReferences, class System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider codeProvider, class System.CodeDom.CodeCompileUnit codeCompileUnit, class System.Web.Services.Description.WebReferenceOptions options) cil managed

public: static System::Collections::Specialized::StringCollection ^ GenerateWebReferences(System::Web::Services::Description::WebReferenceCollection ^ webReferences, System::CodeDom::Compiler::CodeDomProvider ^ codeProvider, System::CodeDom::CodeCompileUnit ^ codeCompileUnit, System::Web::Services::Description::WebReferenceOptions ^ options);

param.name: webReferences
param.span: 要编译的 Web 引用的 。

span.span: A of Web references to compile.
A that specifies the code provider.
A that specifies the unit into which code is compiled.
A that specifies code generation options.

summary.span: 编译 Web 引用的集合，以生成客户端代理或服务器存根。

span.span: Compiles a collection of Web references to produce a client proxy or a server stub.
A of compiler warnings.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在每个服务说明文档集合的成员`webReferences`集合应仅包含和对象。The services description document collection in each member of the `webReferences` collection should contain only and objects. 此方法不能解释对象。This method is unable to interpret objects. 如果任何 XML Web 服务中的方法`webReferences`集合共享自定义参数或返回类型，这些类型还在所生成的代理方法之间共享。If any of the XML Web service methods in the `webReferences` collection share custom parameter or return types, those types are also shared among the proxy methods generated. 这是在其中单独，编译每个代理的情况相比的重要优势，因为在这种情况下此类类型执行不进行互操作。This is an important advantage over the situation in which each proxy is compiled separately, because in that case such types do not interoperate.

summary.span: 获取或设置用于访问所说明的 XML Web services 的协议。

span.span: Gets or sets the protocol used to access the described XML Web services.

value.span: ，其中包含要导入的协议的不区分大小写的名称。

span.span: A that contains the case-insensitive name of the protocol to be imported.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性允许的值包括：The allowed values of this property are: - "Soap""Soap" - "Soap12""Soap12" - "HttpPost""HttpPost" - "HttpGet""HttpGet" - "HttpSoap""HttpSoap" 默认值为"Soap"，表示 SOAP 1.1 标准。The default value is "Soap", which indicates the SOAP 1.1 standard. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性时使用类。The following example illustrates the use of the property when using the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 与任何窗体只读属性的集合，成员可以添加到集合，集合中的删除或修改使用由集合公开的方法。As with any collection that forms a read-only property, members can be added to the collection, removed from the collection, or modified using the methods exposed by the collection. 你还可以使用方法将成员添加到此集合。You can also use the method to add members to this collection. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性。The following example illustrates the use of the property. [!code-cpp[WebServices_Description_Importer#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebServices_Description_Importer/CPP/import.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[WebServices_Description_Importer#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebServices_Description_Importer/CS/import.cs#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Web::Services::Description::ServiceDescriptionImportStyle Style { System::Web::Services::Description::ServiceDescriptionImportStyle get(); void set(System::Web::Services::Description::ServiceDescriptionImportStyle value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值确定导入 值时所生成的代码的样式（客户端或服务器）。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that determines the style of code (client or server) that is generated when the values are imported.
One of the values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果属性设置为、生成所述的 Web 服务的功能提供通过调用它们的客户端代理类。If the property is set to , the generates client proxy classes that provide the functionality of the described Web services by calling them. 如果属性设置为、实例生成表示所述的 XML Web 服务的功能，而不实现它们的抽象类。If the property is set to , the instance generates abstract classes that represent the functionality of the described XML Web services without implementing them. 然后可以通过编写从这些抽象类继承并实现相关的方法的类来实现它们。You can then implement them by writing classes that inherit from these abstract classes and implement the relevant methods. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性。The following example illustrates the use of the property. [!code-cpp[WebServices_Description_Importer#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebServices_Description_Importer/CPP/import.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[WebServices_Description_Importer#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebServices_Description_Importer/CS/import.cs#3)]
